profile:
Aqua Tech Waterproofing  is the most experienced and affordable privately owned company that offers basement  waterproofing,underpinning, basement lowering,concrete floors and drain services to families and businesses across the Greater Toronto Area. Based out of Toronto and operating over 20  trucks across GTA, we are conveniently located to service you in Oakville, Richmond Hill, Metro Toronto or Ajax. 

With more than 25 years of experience our trained technicians offer a quality, reliable and stress free waterproofing service. You can count on it. In addition, our friendly and professional staff is here to answer any questions you may have about our company or our services. 

Have an emergency? Don’t hesitate. Our 24 hour Emergency phone line is here to serve you better.

Clogged drains? Leaking taps? Clogged toilet? Repairs? and more? We have what you need at highly competitive prices you can afford. We will either match or even beat other estimates. At Aqua Tech Waterproofing and Drain, our goal is about doing the job right the first time around.

We use the most sophisticated technology combined with high knowledge of our services, which means the problem is fixed fast by a systems qualified plumber, leaving you worry free.

We look forward to hearing from you.
service_area: We cover all of the GTA and most surrounding areas: Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Brampton, Etobicoke, Burlington, Scarborough, Maple, Woodbridge, King city, Milton, Ajax, etc. If your city/town is not mentioned please feel free to call us to check if we cover your area

profile:
The Crack Speciaists, specialize in diagnosing and repairing structural and water proofing issues directly related to foundations. We speciailize in wet basements repairs, interior and exterior foundation cracks, sump pumps and french drain installations, weeping tile systems, drainage issues and waterproofing. 

Call us for a free, written estimate with no obligation. Guarantee Lifetime Warranty that is transferable.  Please call today to arrange for a consultation.

profile:
RCC WATERPROOFING TORONTO
Phone: 416-747-1920 or toll free 1888-766-2071
 Basement Waterproofing Toronto, Hamilton, London, Scarborough, Mississauga, Oakville, Vaughan and more!

Wet Basement? Since 1920, Toronto homeowners and businesses have trusted RCC Waterproofing Toronto to solve their basement foundation repair issues. With over 100 years of experience in waterproofing solutions, RCC Waterproofing has the right waterproofing services for all your leaky basement and structural foundation concerns. We are waterproofing contractors specializing in residential, commercial, and industrial structures in Toronto, Hamilton, Niagara, London, Oshawa, Barrie, and everywhere in between - Leaky basements made permanently dry, from the interior basement or exterior foundation. Look up waterproofing near me and guaranteed you will find us and RCC Waterproofing will be ready to take on any basement leak repair.

RCC Waterproofing's experience in solving wet basements, damp basements, foundation cracks, and basement leaks is second to none. We offer waterproofing services like external waterproofing, internal waterproofing, sump pump repair, basement underpinning & basement lowering, basement repair, foundation repair and crack repair. Trust in the wet basement people to get the job done!

profile:
As a certified Basement Systems dealer, Omni Basement Systems is a foundation repairing, basement and crawl space waterproofing company providing state-of-the-art foundation repairing and basement waterproofing systems. Re-setting the structural integrity of a home, drying wet basements, or waterproofing crawl spaces is our business - it is what we do everyday. 
Fully licensed, insured, and accredited with the BBB.  Our nationally backed warranty stands above our competition and gives our customers reassurance that our products and services will meet all needs and expectations. We are open and using precautions during Covid-19. 
Servicing Hamilton, Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Georgetown, Guelph, Kitchener/Waterloo, Cambridge, St. Catharines, Niagara, Fort Erie, Port Dover, Brantford,  Simcoe,  Grimsby, Port Colborne. 
We will be happy to arrange for a free Inspection for  homeowners.  Please contact us at 905-296-6664 or  https://www.omnibasementsystems.com/free-estimate.html
Visit Facebook and Instagram https://www.facebook.com/omnibasementsystems/   https://www.instagram.com/omnibasementsystems/

profile:
Ariss Landscape Inc. is a passionate landscape design and construction company laser-focused on delivering the highest quality landscaping and outdoor spaces in southern Ontario. Attention to detail and a love for good-looking areas keep us always striving to add an attractive appeal to everything we build. 

We treat your home like it’s our own. We treat you like we would want a contractor to treat our family. It’s the right thing to do, and it’s good for long-term business success. 

We build our landscapes to last, and we build our landscapes to look beautiful. We want you to love your home and enjoy it. Having a designer on staff ensures that even if a project does not have a drawn-up and presented design, it will have an aesthetic appeal. Quality construction is at our core, and we build things to last. Period. 

We do everything possible to ensure a timely and efficient construction process. We keep our sites clean and politely interact with neighbors to walk them through what’s going on and the construction process.

Our Process:

1.	Call for an initial consultation
2.	Arrange an on-site meeting
3.	Receive a Quote with a few price options
4.	Watch us build your beautiful new space
5.	Enjoy!
name: Ariss Landscape Inc.

profile:
We are a family owned and operated waterproofing business. We offer residential basement waterproofing, weeping tile installation, and basement foundation crack repair in the Golden Horseshoe area of Southern Ontario. We differentiate ourselves on three categories from our competitors:

Quality: We ensure the highest levels of work using approved methods and products, not cutting corners and paying attention to the small details.

Price: We keep our prices reasonable by eliminating inflated overhead costs. We are the owners and operators of the business, and there is only two of us. 

Speed: No one wants workers in and out or around their house for days. Most of our work is completed in 4 days or less days for larger projects (whole house excavation and waterproofing) and most often less extensive work only takes 1or 2 days.
services:
Basement Waterproofing
Foundation Crack Repair
Weeping Tile Replacement
Epoxy Crack Injections

profile:
Green Tech Sealants provides professional completion of caulking, re-caulking, fire-stop, sealing, and weatherproofing services throughout Ontario Canada. We are experts in caulking, re-caulking, and fire stopping applications. Our professional technicians work with the most advanced equipment available, and we take care to use domestic, environmentally friendly materials.

*** 

Services:


EXTERIOR CAULKING

Windows, Doors, Vents

Mortar Repair

Pools (Coping & Liner)

Stucco

Walkways & Patios

***
​
FIRE STOP APPS

Fire Rated Joints

Pipe Penetrations

Cabling Devices

Fire Stop Sleeves

Any  Intumescent Fire Proofing Applications 

***

INTERIOR CAULKING

profile:
Leaders in foundation waterproofing and weeping tile.

Den-Rick Weeping Tile offers various services for both residential and commercial construction. Whether you are building a new home or you have leaks in the basement of your current home, we can help.

Why choose us for your waterproofing needs? 
	Certified, fully insured & covered by WSIB
	Written guarantee on all work performed
	Free no obligation written estimate
	On time and on budget

Our superior workmanship equals customer satisfaction. Den-Rick has been built on repeat customers and referrals. This philosophy, together with quality materials, ensures every job is done right.

Each of our services listed are what we specialize in so you can be assured of qualified, well trained staff working on your project.
Den-Rick services Kitchener-Waterloo, Cambridge, Guelph, Elmira, Woodstock and all surrounding areas. Call us today to learn more about our skilled workers, dedication to customer service and competitive prices.
